select hotplace.hotplace_id, attraction_type.attraction_type, hotplace.image, hotplace.title, user.name, hotplace.read_count, SUM(bookmark_favor.bookmark) AS bookmark_count, SUM(bookmark_favor.favor) AS favor_count, COUNT(comments.hotplace_comment_id) AS comment_count, hotplace.created_at, hotplace.updated_at from hotplace LEFT JOIN hotplace_bookmark_favor AS bookmark_favor ON hotplace.hotplace_id = bookmark_favor.hotplace_id LEFT JOIN hotplace_comments AS comments ON hotplace.hotplace_id = comments.hotplace_id LEFT JOIN attraction ON hotplace.attraction_id = attraction.attraction_id LEFT JOIN attraction_type ON attraction.attraction_type_id = attraction_type.attraction_type_id LEFT JOIN user ON hotplace.user_id = user.user_id
AND hotplace.hotplace_id = #{hotplaceId}
AND hotplace.user_id = #{userId}
AND hotplace.title like CONCAT('%',#{keywordTitle},'%')
Group by hotplace.hotplace_id, attraction_type.attraction_type
having hotplace.title is not null
order by updated_at ASC
order by title ASC
order by title DESC
order by read_count ASC
order by read_count DESC
ORDER BY COUNT(comments.hotplace_id) ASC
ORDER BY COUNT(comments.hotplace_id) DESC
ORDER BY COUNT(hotplace_bookmark_favor.hotplace_id) ASC
ORDER BY COUNT(hotplace_bookmark_favor.hotplace_id) DESC
ORDER BY COUNT(hotplace_bookmark_favor.hotplace_id) ASC
ORDER BY COUNT(hotplace_bookmark_favor.hotplace_id) DESC
